text: Sylvie Maurial-Jamin (born 19 September 1949) is a French water skier. She was named to the International Water Ski Hall of Fame. She competed at the 1972 Summer Olympics, where waterskiing was a demonstration sport, in the three events. She won the Jumping event, finished third in the Tricks event and finished 4th in the Slalom event. At the 1973 Water Ski World Championships, she became world champion. She was 5 times European champion between 1971 and 1973. Maurial became Officer of the National Order of Merit on 10 May 1995. She is married to water skier Jean-Michel Jamin, who also competed at the 1972 Summer Olympics.
